description: Pile on ￼familiar patterns for fall — in the form of sensual dresses, separates and accessories.
title: In Fashion: Nostalgic Scarf Prints Come Back Into View
title_page: In Fashion: Nostalgic Scarf Prints Come Back Into View - The New York Times
text: Marine Serre dress, price on request, top, $637, and scarf (worn on right hand) $198, marineserre.com. Gucci scarf (worn behind), $510. Balenciaga scarf (worn around neck), $450, similar styles at (310) 854-0557. Molly Goddard tights, about $105, Dover Street Market New York.
